name: Hard Time Bomb
description: A bomb has been set to go off! You have to find the wire and cut it in order to stop the timer.  There is a global `var` that holds the numeric ID to which wire to cut. Find that and then you can Bomb.CutTheWire(wireKey);

session.setup:
var wireCode; // Find the wire.
Bomb.CutTheWire(wireCode);
